resources.string: Are you sure to discard all the changes that you have committed for this note just now?

I take great proud of implementing this awesome feature that provides capability of manging your clipboard history without leaving your current app whenever you are inputting your email address, frequently used password, date timestamp or any other notes, which makes my life so much easier. If you share the same experience with me, please rate AnyCopy on Google Play with your feedback, which has been and will always be strongest support from you and the greatest encouragement for me to make AnyCopy better. Thank you!

{n_times} more incorrect attempts will lock your account in this device.

For security purpose, the Pincode will be removed upon failing verifying it in 10 times, which will also cause the lock down of AnyCopy. It can be setup again any time after unlocking AnyCopy by Master Password.

AnyCopy is an application that shows absolute respect to your data privacy and data security. As an Android software developer with three years experiences related in Android Privacy and Security research, I hate to tell you the astonishing fact that your privacy are at high risk to any application that you installed with {network_permission}. Why? Because Android System does not explicitly require permission to allow applications running on background nor to monitor your system Clipboard. This means that, as long as an App is granted to {network_permission}, which actually has already granted by default, even in Android 6.0, all data that you have ever copied, such as phone number, bank account, email and so on, could be possibly uploaded to third parties. This is an issue that should deserve more much attention than it should be. So here comes AnyCopy, an app that does not require any {network_permission}, which means that all your data will only be saved locally unless you manually upload your data into Google Drive, which means that you have absolute control of your data privacy. And given the security integrated in AnyCopy, you could be the only one in this world that could access your data in AnyCopy.

AnyCopy shows absolutely respect to your data privacy and data security. It does not require any {network_permission} at all, which makes sure that whatever copied in AnyCopy stays in AnyCopy. But it does not stop there. As I do understand that there are times when you wish you could back up your invaluable data into cloud server to make sure that you will never ever lose it. But how could this be achieved without {network_permission}? Here comes the beauty of AnyCopy which I take great proud of delivering it into your hand. It will fully utilizes the magic of Google Play service, which will be able to backup data in AnyCopy into your Google Drive account with encryption. And again, here comes another awesomeness of AnyCopy. Nobody, even Google, could possibly access the data that you have ever saved as it has been encrypted with AES-256-CBC algorithm. You are the only person in this universe that could access the data in AnyCopy and you are the only one who is responsible to preserve the data properly.
Set an 4 digits Pincode to enhance security

Your account has already been upgraded to Premium type, thank you very much for supporting me.
How AnyCopy Premium makes you better:
Customize the size of the note
Customize the size of the note that is saved to AnyCopy up to {characters_count} characters.
Back up and restore all your data with Google Drive. All your notes could be saved and secured forever.
Merge multiple notes into a new single note.
Unlimited number of clipboard history on double tapping input fields.
Automatically save notes from different apps into corresponding folders. For example, if your note is copied from Twitter, the note will be saved into a folder with name "Twitter" automatically.
Customize the default folder to save the note copied to clipboard
You have been upgraded to AnyCopy Premium. Thank you very much for supporting me.
Unexpected error possibly due to multiple Google accounts in your device. Please try again later.
Long press the following text, select any words that you like and copy them. They will be automatically saved into AnyCopy.
Honor, respect, decency, duty, dignity, integrity, honesty, loyalty, responsibility, reliability, stability, and predictability.
You could globally search with any key words and the result will be instantly ready for you to access.
You could create folders to categorize different types of notes and even set an extra key to lock a folder to stop others access it.
You could generate the date template which you would always get the current timestamp in your desired format when you copy it.
You could quickly start the app from notification panel and copy your frequently used notes for further usage.
Max count of characters in a single note

The note length should set between {mini_count} and {max_count}, please input a number between them.
The max count of clipboard history should set between {mini_count} and {max_count}, please input a number between them.
Automatically save the copied notes into corresponding folders
Features which are only supported by Premium Account.

It will be great honor and enormous encouragement to me by rating AnyCopy with your comments. And your feedback means a lot to me as it is exactly your support and feedback that keeps striving me making AnyCopy better and better.
Your notes are being exported into file {file_name}.You could view the file right under folder {folder}.
Your notes have been exported into file {file_name}.You could view the file right under folder {folder}.
Your notes have been imported into AnyCopy.You could view the notes right under NOTE tab.

All your notes will be backed up into a json file without encryption. Your date templates and folders will be omitted.By default when your notes are imported, it will be imported into NOTE tab. Again your data is not encrypted. Please think twice before exporting your data.

You could select json files which you have exported before. Or you could choose txt file which will also be imported. And the text will be divided into notes which could maximally have {characters_count} characters each.
Your data is being imported. It could take a moment depending on your file size.
The size of the file that you have chosen is too large to import. It is supposed to be smaller than {size}.
You could only import file name ending with \'txt\' or \'json\'.
Select a txt file or json file
FAVORITE tab doesn\'t list any folders. It lists all favorited notes. If you create folder under FAVORITE tab, it will still be listed under NOTE tab.

Check out this must-have app {app} which lists your entire clipboard history on double-taping input text field and automatically saves all the text copied to system Clipboard with absolute respect to your privacy and guarantee to data security.
The feature of {feature} requires the permission of {permission_name} in your device, please click OK to grant it.

This feature requires the permission of {permission_name} to be activated. Please tap OPEN SETTINGS which will list all apps requesting the accessibility services. Then choose AnyCopy and activate the service.
Google Play no longer supports applications that require accessibility service permission. Please click OK to download and install the AnyCopy Double Tap plugin.
showing undo pop up on saving note
showing clipboard history on double tapping input fields
AnyCopy requires Permission to show undo pop up. Please click OK to grant it.
Enter your Master Password to unlock the account.
Your account has been unlocked successfully by using Master Password. Please be reminded that you need to reset your Pincode if you want to enhance your security and privacy.
You have successfully set up your master password. Please remember it like a bank password. Now you are ready to set up the Pincode.
You have successfully set up your master password. Please remember it like a bank password. Now you will be guided to turned permission {apps_with_usage_access}.
You have successfully turned on the permission. Now you are ready to set up the Pincode.

Congratulations! Your Pincode has been successfully set up. Now nobody could access your data without verifying Pincode. By default, the Pincode will be required immediately once AnyCopy is put into background. But you could set up a custom time interval such as one minute, one day or one week for Pincode verification. Press OK to check it out.
Set a master password to enhance security
Master Password has been set up successfully. Please remember it correctly and do not share it to others.
Master Password has been set up successfully. Please remember it correctly and do not share it to others.
Master Password has been changed successfully. Please remember it correctly and do not share it to others.

Master Password are the ultimate key to protect your data and privacy. 

A. When you fail in verifying Pincode in ten times, AnyCopy will be locked. And the only way to unlock your app will be the Master Password that you set. 

B. When you are backing up your notes on the SD card or trying to restore your notes from Google Drive, you will be required to verify your Master Password. 

C. When you forget the key to unlock the note folders that you create, you could use Master Password to remove the lock on the note folder. 

D. In conclusion, please remember your Master Password as the password like your bank account and never share it to others.
Change Master Password to enhance security
Change Pincode or Pincode validation interval
If you want to use Key to lock a folder or note, you are required to set a Master Password which could help you remove any key in case that you forget the key to unlock them. Press OK to continue.
AnyCopy need your permission to export notes or notes as images into your sdcard. Please go to grant it by pressing OK.
AnyCopy need your permission to import notes from your sdcard. Please go to grant it by pressing OK.
AnyCopy automatically saves everything that you copy.
AnyCopy shows your search result instantly.
Double click any input field to access the whole clipboard history of AnyCopy to truly paste any selected item in one tap.
Secure your data with Pincode.\nManage your notes with folders.\nGenerate customized date template.
